verses.roman:
'avimṛṣṭa-vidheyāṁśa'--ei doṣera nāma
āra eka doṣa āche, śuna sāvadhāna

synonyms: avimṛṣṭa-vidheyāṁśa—avimṛṣṭa-vidheyāṁśa; ei—this; doṣera—of the fault; nāma—the name; āra—another; eka—one; doṣa—fault; āche—there is; śuna—hear; sāvadhāna—carefully.
translation: "Not only is there the fault avimṛṣṭa-vidheyāṁśa, but there is also another fault, which I shall point out to you. Kindly hear Me with great attention.
